extendedInfo.description: *ROOTED ONLY*Turn on or turn off the backlight of keyboard. This is an application with only single feature ripped from AdjBrightness but with auto boot supported.***If you installed both AdjBrightness and Keyboard backlight controller, please untick the button settings in AdjBrightness***

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Great App ! It does give you control over the backlight on/off of the buttons. I have been looking for an app like it it because I want my buttons\' lights to be ON as long as the screen is on.
reviews.author: Karim Farid

reviews.title: Finally found it!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for a way to turn of my Atrix 4G button lights and your app finally did it in great fashion.  Works flawlessly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Turns annoying backlights off, but
reviews.comment: Settings don\'t stick after reboot. Using this on Droid razr maxx with ics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth trying
reviews.comment: Sort of works on miui rom for u8800. Turned lights off which is what I wanted, but can\'t turn back on. Probably hardware/roms fault though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Edit
reviews.comment: Edit/ seems unreliable sometimes led on when screen off & kills batt.....  had been looking for a way to lock back lights on at all times, finally found it ... thank you dev., exactly what I wanted. 5stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Make it turn off keyboard light on my DROID pro when alarm clock is on at night and it would be 5-star and worth $10! The slide dimmer is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Simple effective, does what it says. And is the only app of its kind that has worked for me on my droid x!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A fix for me
reviews.comment: Used to fix backlights not turning on in New Rom on HTC incredible. Only thing I wish was option to hide app icon .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DROID2
reviews.comment: Great app and no adds ... helps bring my stubborn phones lights on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply perfect.
reviews.comment: EXACTLY what I have been looking for. Old ROM had this feature built in. New one doesn\'t. I like my hardware lights ON! Thank you!
reviews.author: Sherri Felix

reviews.title: Works perfectly :)
reviews.comment: Thanks for saving my eyes. Amaze, speed rom 8.0
reviews.author: Angela WM

reviews.title: Reboot and settings are gone
reviews.comment: Coming from an LG Optimus 4X HD with capacitive button backlights. The \"lights off\" function does work, but does not save with rebooting. Please add an option for that and I will rerate this app to 5 stars. Thank you!
reviews.author: Matthew Tan

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Does what I need it to do but would be better if the lock off setting would work on boot. For instance when you reboot you have to toggle lock off for it to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works!!
reviews.comment: My soft keys are lighting up again! Talk about frustrating reboot the phone they keys lite up use the phone and they didn\'t work. I love my T-bolt but the battery issue and other stuff are making this phone suck bad.  Thank you so much for making this program which helps make my T-bolt suck just a little less and avoids having replacement after replacement sent out or spending way to much time with VS techs.trying to figure out why this isn\'t working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect on Droid X!
reviews.comment: Thanks Developer Works flawlessly on my rooted DROID X running gingerbread. Can\'t stand having those bright light keys on and this takes care of keeping them off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Tab 7
reviews.comment: Good app! It solved my problem with my soft key lights that are not turning off. But when i lock my device and unlock it, the soft key lights turns on again. Kindly update dev and I will give 5 stars. Thank you for this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just great!!
reviews.comment: I was looking for something like this for ages... It works perfectly and solved my problem totally. 100% recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works mostly on B79 / Zopo 100 / x310e /
reviews.comment: Ever since I upgraded to ICS, my button back lights went out after a few seconds (which is retarded!).  This app solves this problem,... mostly. Its not 100% reliable, I think it gets removed from memory by android and thats when it stops working, and the light can remain either on or off.  Im no android dev, but this might be solved by putting something in the notification bar, to avoid android closing this app?  Also, I would *love* to extend the functionality to have this backlight flash when there is a notification, as my phone doesnt have a notification LED. Release it as payware and Ill gladly pay for it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: All I wanted to do was to shut off the backlight on the hard buttons off my Droid X. This app did the job perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Easily the best app for the Motorola Triumph, and the annoying hard key lights. Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User
